page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER. TREDIS
page.content: THE AREA IS PATROLLED BY POLICE PANDA CARS FROM TORPOINT.999 CALLS GO THROUGH LAUNCESTON,BUT POLICE CLAIM THAT THEY CAN BE ON THE SCENE WITHIN TWENTY MINUTES OF BEING CALLED. MOST INCIDENTS CONSIST OF ROAD ACCIDENTS AND PETTY THEFT, WITH OCCASIONAL RUSTLING OF LIVESTOCK AND SOME DRUG OFFENCES. THE ROAD FROM TRIFFLE TO CRAFTHOLE (AND THENCE TO TREGANTLE) HAS BEEN DESIGNATED A CLEARWAY- THE ONLY ONE IN THE DISTRICT. THIS HAS CAUSED CONTROVERSY AMONG THOSE WISHING TO PARK TO DESCEND TO THE NUDIST BEACH AT COLEADON POINT,AND OTHER COVES. SPEEDING THROUGH POLBATHIC HAS RESULTED IN BAD ACCIDENTS- TWO DEATHS IN THE PAST YEAR.RE-MARKING AND ERECTING OF BOLLARDS, NOW IN PROGRESS, WILL HOPEFULLY IMPROVE THE SITUATION.
